extension.summary: Specializes in Furk and Easynews. This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only.
extension.description: Specializes in Furk and Easynews(web) account access. Also utilizes Openscrapers for those without a Furk or Easynews(web) account. This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only. Please Note: This add-on is NOT an Exodus fork, and as such will behave differently to an Exodus fork.

extension.news: INFO: For latest changes see Changelog within Tools of add-on.
